desc: DiviTrain offers around 3000 of the latest IT e-learning courses, with 365 days access, live labs, 24/7 live mentoring, official practice exams, tips and tricks.

layout.text: Study online for a great ICT Career with our Unique CertKits!

World-class online training with 24/7 Tutor support
Study in your own time, when and where you want
Achieve international recognized ICT certifications fast
Work anywhere in the world and earn a very good salary!
